Posts.EditableText: I noticed the page on Quest at IFWiki was still about Quest 4, so thought I would have a go at rewriting it. http://www.ifwiki.org/index.php/Quest_%28Language%29 And moved Quest 4 to here (but did not change it apart from linking back to Quest 5): http://www.ifwiki.org/index.php/Quest_4 What do you think?
Posts.HTML:
I noticed the page on Quest at IFWiki was still about Quest 4, so thought I would have a go at rewriting it.
http://www.ifwiki.org/index.php/Quest_%28Language%29

And moved Quest 4 to here (but did not change it apart from linking back to Quest 5):
http://www.ifwiki.org/index.php/Quest_4

What do you think?

Posts.EditableText: Thanks, looks very good - the old info was definitely very out of date.
Posts.HTML: Thanks, looks very good - the old info was definitely very out of date.

Posts.EditableText: I'm not registered on that site so I can't make any edits, so I thought I'd point out this little error I saw in your write-up! [quote:306ubivz]Quest 5 is an authoring system designed for [b:306ubivz]non-programmers[/b:306ubivz] and [b:306ubivz]non-programmers[/b:306ubivz] alike.[/quote:306ubivz] Just a friendly heads up!
Posts.HTML:
I'm not registered on that site so I can't make any edits, so I thought I'd point out this little error I saw in your write-up!

Quest 5 is an authoring system designed for non-programmers and non-programmers alike.



Just a friendly heads up!
